divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my friend were driving down street road in buckingham and we both saw a bright beam of red light shoot down to the earth. I first thought it was lightning but it was red and lit the clouds up red. Another friend who was not with me at the time but also witnessed the beam and mentioned it to me saying how strange it was. It was a perfectly straight beam
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There was one other sighting in Philadelphia on or around August 15th 2009
Summary: Bright red beam flashes down to earth
